attributes.title: This sucks😡😡😡
attributes.review: I was trying to use the app to see what the wonderful presidents plans were but when I got on It just continued to crash and now I can’t even log on. Extremely disappointed. I thought the presidents OFFICIAL app would work a lot better.

attributes.title: omg where do i start?????
attributes.review: THIS APP IS SO BAD !!!!! i honestly went on there to see what’s happening w our president and found out he’s a RACIST, HOMOPHOBIC, FACIST, SEXIST PERSON!!! not only that, the app itself was a literal sh*t hole. the looks were horrible, and the “rewards” were stupid like what ???? the text messages were so trash and so uneducated on everything and sometimes it would just bash other people for no reason. i don’t know why this is even an app it’s horrible. i rather play subway surfers and episode 😹 i literally hate this app. and you should not get it!!

attributes.title: TikTok
attributes.review: I have never seen a president so dumb.Why ban TikTok, because it shares private info?So dose every other social media,so you wonder why adds are relevant for you.I wouldn’t be wasting my time writing a review about a stupid president but I’m just giving this thing one star so it can be removed from the App Store.
